    Exam report

    exam_report.Rmd
    library(examMarkR)
library(tidyverse)

    Getting the template

    The template is an Rmarkdown template:

    knitr::include_graphics("template.png")

    Template dialog box

    Example grade summary

    Table

    marks %>% exam_grade_summary(grade) %>% knitr::kable()
    grade n N Prop
    FNA 6 63 0.10
    FA 3 63 0.05
    P 17 63 0.27
    C 6 63 0.10
    D 11 63 0.17
    HD 20 63 0.32

    Bar-chart

    marks %>% exam_plot_grades(grade)

    Exam

    marks %>% exam_plot_profile("^Q", grade)

    Scaling

    Method

    Discussion of method used.

    marks  <- 
  marks %>% 
  mutate(
    norm = exam_norm_glonek(total, a = 0.5, b = 1.1)
  )

    Results

    marks %>% exam_compare_norm(total, norm) %>% knitr::kable()
    Grade Proportion for raw Proportion for norm
    FNA 0.0952381 0.0476190
    P 0.2698413 0.1587302
    C 0.0952381 0.1746032
    D 0.1746032 0.1269841
    HD 0.3174603 0.4920635
    FA 0.0476190 0.0000000 
    marks %>% exam_plot_norm(total, norm)
